summary: A note which was added in Old English by the main hand in a margin of a copy of the Latin text of the Historia ecclesiastica. Place of production not known.

notes.head: Addition
notes.body: (fol. 95v) romeburg geitmbred were from frimðe weron agane feower ðusend wintra 7 feor hund. 7 twa 7 hund eahtatig. 7 æfter þem þe rome getimbroð wes wes ures drihtnes acenes ymb seofon hund wintre 7 tiene

admin: Manuscript described by Mary Swan and Owen Roberson, with reference to published scholarship.
